_comment_schema: This file stores the chat conversation history between user and Claude
_comment_usage: Used to provide context for iterations - last 10 turns are included in prompts
_comment_structure: Each turn represents one message exchange with metadata

_field_definitions.id: Sequential turn number (increments for each message)
_field_definitions.iteration: Which iteration number this turn belongs to (0 for pre-build chat)
_field_definitions.status: Only for assistant messages: 'in_progress', 'complete', 'blocked', or omitted
_field_definitions.metadata: Optional additional data (files changed, test results, deploy info, etc.)

_notes: Keep all turns for full project history
Claude prompts use only last 10 turns to avoid context bloat
Status field helps UI show current iteration state
Metadata is flexible - add fields as needed
User messages don't need status field
